entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:04 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: E 22 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
